resources.string: Printoid Hub is a PREMIUM feature, which allows you to show the status of all your 3D printers at the same time, within the same screen!\n A new icon to start this feature has been added to your applications list. You can hide it from the settings of Printoid Hub.
The status of all your 3D printers on the same screen!
Add one of your OctoPrint profiles or more in this board to see their status!
Your OctoPrint profile \'%s\' is already available in Printoid Hub
